DOC.brief_summary: The CANARY ( Coronary Assessment Near-infrared Atherosclerotic Rupture-prone Yellow ) Study pivotal trial evaluate criterion define Lipid Core Plaque ( LCP ) high risk rupture standard care therapy cause intra-procedural complication . If plaque require treatment high normal risk cause intra-procedural complication , life threatening , treat physician well inform may opt take precautionary measure mitigate risk result complication . The CANARY Study also design evaluate feasibility use distal embolization protection device ( EPD ) mean prevent heart attack trigger embolization plaque standard care therapy . It think EPD prevent plaque go downstream treatment obstruct heart vessel . These obstruction could cause heart attack prevent blood reach heart muscle tissue .
DOC.brief_title: CANARY : Coronary Assessment Near-infrared Atherosclerotic Rupture-prone Yellow
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subject least 18 year age Subject schedule elective coronary catheterization Subject willing able provide inform write consent prior index catheterization LipiScan IVUS CIS use contraindicate At least one submit Chemogram obtain entirely within native coronary artery Patient diagnose : stable angina ( CCS I CCS II ) ; positive functional test ischemia ( within precede 30 day ) ; OR Stabilized acute coronary syndrome ( unstable angina ( CCS III , CCS IV ) , non STEMI , STEMI chest pain cardiac symptom > 24 hour Blood cardiac biomarker ( i.e . troponin I , CKMB ) level less local laboratory ULN within 12 hour time PCI guidewire placement . Subject undergo PCI single lesion single native coronary artery enrollment procedure . There prior intent treat target lesion part patient 's clinical care . The target lesion angiographic stenosis visually estimate > =50 % < 100 % The target lesion reference vessel diameter must > =2.5mm ( visually estimate ) Total target lesion length must ≤60 mm ( visually estimate ) The minimum landing zone requirement FilterWire device meet . There must major side branch ( > 2.0 mm diameter ) within target lesion . There must major side branch ( > 2.0mm diameter ) target lesion filter nitinol loop land zone . Exclusion Criteria Subject currently , within precede 30 day , participate device pharmaceutical treatment protocol . Subject life expectancy time enrollment le 2 year ; Subject pregnant suspect pregnant time enrollment Prior coronary bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) PCI perform within 24hours prior start study procedure A PCI plan within 30 day follow enrollment procedure . Unable take aspirin thienopyridine least 30 day Patient experience STEMI non STEMI within past 24 hour Documented LVEF < 25 % patient multilesion multivessel disease require revascularization multiple lesion enrollment catheterization Any angiographic evidence thrombus coronary artery There evidence dissection procedural complication prior randomization Patient unprotected leave main ( ≥50 % stenosis ) leave main equivalent disease Target Lesion locate distal segment target native coronary artery Proximal bound target lesion locate within 3mm ostium target vessel major side branch ( > 2mm diameter visual estimate ) Target lesion excessively calcify
